name: not showing
title: How to fix songs blanked out: (need to use iTunes for this)
description:
1. Remove the song from your Library and Playlists
2. Update iCloud Music Library
3. Close iTunes and reopen, checking to make sure the song is fully gone
4. Re-add the song to your Library and Playlist, then edit the metadata for one of the songs you added (add a comment or something)
5. Update iCloud Music Library

- Song should now be fully synced and working again.

(You can also try `/restrictions` command if this does not work)
